hero.subtitle: We’re building a simple, reliable way to run brackets, schedules and results without spreadsheets or chaos.

crud.title: Full CRUD for your data
crud.body: Create and manage tournaments, groups, teams, players and custom fields. Edit anytime without breaking your schedule.

venues.title: Venues & timeslots
venues.body: Add venues/courts with available timeslots so scheduling respects location and time constraints.

roundRobin.title: Smart scheduling (Round-robin)
roundRobin.body: Generate balanced round-robin matchups automatically with sensible ordering and byes.

reschedule.title: Reschedule with confidence
reschedule.body: Drag or edit a match and we keep the schedule consistent—no double-booking or overlaps.

results.title: Results & standings
results.body: Record scores, update tables in real-time, and keep an accurate view of group rankings.

publicPages.title: Public pages & custom domains
publicPages.body: Share read-only tournament pages for brackets, fixtures and tables. Use your own domain for a branded experience.

items.rrToPlayoffs: Round-robin → Playoffs flow (auto bracket from group tables)
items.enhancedPublic: Enhanced public pages (fixtures, results, live table)
items.moreSports: Additional sports: Volleyball, Basketball, Tennis, Padel
